adv_forest_30: ^As we get closer, we see a small tunnel.
^What is this? <b>Did a mole pass by?
^The mole lives deep in the mine... I've never seen it before!
^Oh, and!!! A mole will give you something sweet!!!! I really like sweet things!!!
^If I get that as a gift... <b>I'm not going anywhere and I'm going to eat the candy little by little.
^Anyway, I can't go any deeper here!
adv_sea_30: ^This voice is only for you...@I can listen to you!
^If there's anything I want to give you...@ Give me what you want!
^(Who should I give a present to?)

g-0: ^See you again...Hmph, I can't help it

answer_undine_good: ^Thank you very much. You made me happy!
answer_undine_bad: ^Laughing out loud! Thank you, thank you!
^This is something I cherish I'll give it to you specially! Check your bag~
adv_mine_30: ^Oh my god... Isn't there one here...
^Oh, my! You're a young man, aren't you...And that Mouse.
^No. Well, it's hard for a human to come this far... I don't have a lot.
^Well, if you have it, it's a different story.

c-1: ^If you have it, please feel free to look for it.

choice_mole: ^Oh, my God. I've been waiting for someone as cool as you.
^<b>Give it to me and I'll give you some valuable information.
^Oh, and... We'll give you something sweet.

c-0: ^Yeah, well, aren't you disappointed at all?

answer_mole: ^Look at this solid surface... It's so brilliant, it's emitting a light that can't be compared to anything else, and if you collect that pleasant sparkle, you can fill the vast sky... The innumerable rays of light you can be felt inside...
^...well, hold on. <b>That's... Won't you give it to me?
^...Oh, no. I lost my mind for a moment. I apologize.
^As you know, this is where magic becomes power. The wizard holds a lot of things.
^It was the alchemist who challenged that authority.
^Especially your teacher... There were a lot of problems.
^I put comforting in my bag. Thank you very much for your kindness.
off_mine_0_false: ^I've been waiting for you. His disciple.
^You left the Mouse behind. It sounds good.
^...Oh, I don't know where to start.
choice_stranger_true: ^Is there anything you want to hear again?

c-2: ^...I wish you the best of luck.

choice_stranger: ^Is there anything you want to hear?

c-0: ^Now everything is possessed by the wizards. ^Money, power, freedom... ^It's getting harder for those who can't do magic without mana by nature. ^Your teacher, Basic, was doing a forbidden study. ^So that everyone can handle the mana that only the wizard can handle... You were making the ultimate material. ^The result was successful. ^...But this news came to the wizards, too. ^The wizards were afraid of their power being divided. ^They wanted to send him somewhere to stop him, and they wanted to take the ultimate material, but... ^Just before you left, The research tool was removed and it became impossible. ^In order to recreate the research tool, we had to interpret the equation ^Wizards who couldn't interpret alchemists' formulas... ^Found an alchemist who can interpret formulas. ^...That's you.
c-1: ^The mouse is the sorcerer's assistant. ^Follow your actions and watchand deliver them to the wizards. ^I don't know how you got away with it, but... You've done a nice job.

quest_stranger: ^Keep making research tools so that mice don't doubt them.
^And meet undine at sea and give treasure. Then you'll get the drugs.
^Use it in the decisive moment when the research tool is completed.
^If we succeed, we can keep our research.

b: ^If you have any questions, please come back.
^...I wish you the best of luck.
